items.title: The Harrow
items.description:
This is a demonstration store. .

  • The Harrow is derived of the playful pop ideal. A profile milled to press and preform is layered up with our blended triaxial glass which couples triaxe and biaxe to give you the best of both while adding two centered carbon stringers from each the tip/tail to the inserts while finishing off with a sintered base structure. These “premium medium” materials with a longer riding radius on a true twin board with accommodating waist widths offers a playful yet poppy deck which delivers in many aspects of day to day riding.

items.title: Factory Winter Trigger Mitt
items.description:
This is a demonstration store. .

  • Hydrogauge™ protection blocks out moisture
  • Thinsulate™ fill offers increased insulation with reduced bulk
  • Flocked PU nose wipe keeps distractions to a minimum
  • Shell: 65% Goatskin Leather, 15% Neoprene, 15% Spandex, 5% Polyurethane. Lining/Insulation: 100% Polyester.
  • Imported
  • HYDROGAUGE™ This rating system allows for a comparative measure of waterproofing and breathability, performance features specifically engineered for skiing and snowboarding in the harshest environments.
  • WATERPROOF Our technologies in waterproofing optimize protection without choking off breathability. This ensures comfort in apparel, and helps minimize odor in accessories by reducing the threat of microbial growth among contents that are stored while still moist.
  • WINDPROOF
  • Wind chill can quickly lower body temperature, diminishing performance and threatening safety with hypothermia. "Windproof" apparel is designed to prevent wind penetration for added comfort and protection.
  • WINDSTOPPER®
  • This textile is fully windproof, yet it offers maximum breathability to minimize moisture buildup and maintain performance comfort.

items.title: The Honalee
items.description:
This is a demonstration store. .

  • The Honalee is built on the ideal that one "premium medium" board can be your vehicle in all scenarios that may present themselves. It's built on a custom milled wood core balanced by a triaxe glass laminate which boasts two centered carbon stringers from each the tip/tail to the inserts while finishing off with a sintered base structure. These quality materials, coupled with a strong straight radius centered on a true twin board, delivers this for a large group of pilots.

  • HYDROGAUGE™ This rating system allows for a comparative measure of waterproofing and breathability, performance features specifically engineered for skiing and snowboarding in the harshest environments.
  • WATERPROOF Our technologies in waterproofing optimize protection without choking off breathability. This ensures comfort in apparel, and helps minimize odor in accessories by reducing the threat of microbial growth among contents that are stored while still moist.
  • WINDPROOF Wind chill can quickly lower body temperature, diminishing performance and threatening safety with hypothermia. "Windproof" apparel is designed to prevent wind penetration for added comfort and protection.
  • WINDSTOPPER® This textile is fully windproof, yet it offers maximum breathability to minimize moisture buildup and maintain performance comfort.

items.title: Soulrider Skis
items.description:
This is a demonstration store. .

The Soul Rider is an extremely playful and versatile all mountain twin. With a 97mm waist, traditional camber under foot and a slight bit of early rise rocker in the tip and tail, you can take this ski wherever you want with confidence. Built for a wide range of skiers, this ski will tackle the park to the peaks and everything in-between while putting a grin on you face from ear to ear.

  • Detailed Construction: ENERGY 2 CARBON

items.title: Process Off-Axis
items.description:
This is a demonstration store. .

  • BEND: PurePop Camber
  • SHAPE: Twin
  • FLEX: Twin
  • CORE: FSC™ Certified Super Fly II™ 700G Core with Dualzone™ EGD™ and Off-Axis Squeezebox
  • FIBERGLASS: Triax™
  • BASE: Sintered
  • FEATURES: The Channel™, Off-Axis Frostbite Edges, Scoop, Pro-Tip™, and Infinite Ride™
  • KEY FEATURE: OFF-AXIS SQUEEZEBOX - Off-Axis aligns the core profiling of Squeezebox to match the typical park rider’s stance for the most natural flex and feel possible. This anatomical alignment results in better toe and heel edge grip, natural flex around the bindings, smoother stability, and energized pop.
